name: Thug Taxi Driver - AAA Star Game
name_original: Thug Taxi Driver - AAA Star Game
description:
Are you ready to crazy leisure, to scare customers, to take the long drift?
Astonishingly beautiful city view will take your breath away with the fever of the game. Hey, come on over and have some fun with Thug Taxi Driver 3D! In Thug Taxi Driver 3D, time is money, and only the craziest cabbies come out victorious. Keep the engines running and get ready to endless entertainment in different road.
Driving a car on the asphalt was never been such an exciting!
Now start your engine and push the throttle very hard on the asphalt.
You wont be forced to buy any special deals No In-app Purchases that will annoy you.
Come on download the game free, join us and rate us 5 stars to encourage us improve the game continuously.
